org.crosswire.common.swing.desktop
类 MDIViewLayout

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.common.swing.desktop.AbstractViewLayout
      org.crosswire.common.swing.desktop.MDIViewLayout
所有已实现的接口：
java.lang.Iterable<java.awt.Component>, Viewable
public class MDIViewLayout
extends AbstractViewLayout

MDI (Multiple documet interface) manager of how we layout views as sub-windows.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com], DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.

updateTitle

public void updateTitle(java.awt.Component view)
从类 AbstractViewLayout 复制的描述
Update the title of the view. If the component does not implement Titleable, then a generated title will be used.

指定者：
接口 Viewable 中的 updateTitle
指定者：
类 AbstractViewLayout 中的 updateTitle
参数：
view - the component whose title is to be used

getSelected

public java.awt.Component getSelected()
从类 AbstractViewLayout 复制的描述
Returns the top view. If no view is the top, it returns the first one added.

指定者：
接口 Viewable 中的 getSelected
指定者：
